pullRequest.title: Chapter cards
pullRequest.bodyText: Basically very similar to the Persons

commit.message: Actor Cards are now 2:3 aspect ratio
Rough implementation of chapter selection cards

nodes.bodyText: Can't you get the image from the data inside ChapterInfoDto?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,10 @@
+package org.jellyfin.androidtv.model.itemtypes
+
+import org.jellyfin.apiclient.model.dto.ChapterInfoDto
+import org.jellyfin.apiclient.model.entities.ImageType
+
+class ChapterInfo(originalChapterInfoDto: ChapterInfoDto, val baseItem: BaseItem, index: Int) {

nodes.bodyText: Add the index option as nullable to the constructor

Just add the index here:
if(imageIndex != null) it.index = imageIndex
Might even be possible to do it without  the if statement (I think null is the default value)
Remove this constructor in favor of the other one I mentioned
You can remove the if statement as the default value if imageIndex is null
